Table 1: Linear evaluation Top-1 accuracies (%). All are based on ResNet-50 pre-trained models.
Table 2: Transfer learning. All are based on ResNet-50 models pre-trained for 200-epoch in ImageNet.
Table 3: Hyperparameters.
Table 4: Hyperparameters for CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 (modified from the hyperparameters ofImageNet).
Table 5: Summary of data augmentation policies (for ImageNet).
Table 6: List of ImageNet-10/100 classesImageNet-10n02002556	n02168699	n02526121	n02930766	n03814639	n03843555	n04179913	n04591713	n07615774	n07717410ImageNet-100									n01484850	n01494475	n01532829	n01560419	n01632458	n01667114	n01689811	n01698640	n01770393	n01796340n01828970	n01843383	n01855032	n01873310	n01978455	n01981276	n01990800	n02007558	n02086910	n02088238n02090721	n02093647	n02096051	n02096294	n02098286	n02111500	n02111889	n02117135	n02123597	n02138441n02167151	n02219486	n02321529	n02363005	n02483708	n02486261	n02492660	n02494079	n02500267	n02783161n02787622	n02802426	n02814860	n02817516	n02883205	n02906734	n02917067	n02978881	n02992529	n03014705n03063599	n03127747	n03255030	n03259280	n03344393	n03404251	n03417042	n03478589	n03482405	n03529860n03642806	n03676483	n03706229	n03761084	n03769881	n03792782	n03803284	n03804744	n03873416	n03982430n03992509	n04044716	n04070727	n04086273	n04141975	n04146614	n04153751	n04162706	n04179913	n04204238n04252225	n04254120	n04355933	n04435653	n04476259	n04517823	n04525305	n04584207	n04613696	n07711569n07714990	n07716906	n07718472	n07718747	n07754684	n09288635	n09472597	n12144580	n12620546	n13054560segmentation tasks (Lin et al., 2014). VOC 07 detection and VOC 07+12 detection tasks fine-tuneFaster R-CNN with C4-backbone (Ren et al., 2015; Wu et al., 2019) in VOC 07 trainval and VOC07 trainval + VOC 12 train respectively and evaluate in VOC 07 test. COCO detection and instancesegmentation tasks fine-tune (1 × schedule) Mask R-CNN with C4-backbone (He et al., 2017; Wuet al., 2019) in COCO 17 train and evaluate in COCO 17 val. In this evaluation, we use 8 × RTX3090 GPUs, the default number of GPUs for the tasks.
